title: The Terminal List: Dark Wolf - Official Teaser Trailer | Prime Video
description: Dive into the dark world of espionage with The Terminal List: Dark Wolf!  This prequel reveals James Reece's (Chris Pratt) past as Ben Edwards, tracing his journey from Navy SEAL to CIA black ops.  Experience the brutal realities of war and its devastating human cost in this thrilling origin story.  See Chris Pratt return in an action-packed adventure!  Watch now!
